results.title: Metformin ameliorates insulin resistance, thyroid nodules and thyroid function.

results.title: TSH lowering effects of metformin: a possible mechanism of action
results.text_hl: Also, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may exert a protective role against @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodules@@@ growth in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin-resistance@@@.

results.title: Metformin in Differentiated Thyroid Cancer: Molecular Pathways and Its Clinical Implications
results.text_hl: Sui et al. conducted a systematic review and meta-analysis that included 7 studies with 240 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ evaluating the relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy and reduction on @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodules@@@.

results.text_hl: Some negative or irrelevance results related to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodule@@@ volume might not be published.

results.title: Effect of metformin on thyroid stimulating hormone and thyroid volume in patients with prediabetes: A randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial
results.text_hl: In prediabetic people, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreases serum TSH, only, in those people with TSH >2.5 muU/ml and reduces the size of small solid @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodules@@@.

results.title: Metformin and thyroid disease.
results.text_hl: Accordingly, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have a smaller @DISEASE_Thyroiditis @DISEASE_MESH:D013966 @@@thyroid@@@ volume and a lower risk of incident @DISEASE_Goiter @DISEASE_MESH:D006042 @@@goiter@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodule@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@.

results.text_hl: Objectives: To evaluate the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@) use on TSH levels, thyroid volume and volume of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@benign thyroid nodules@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@TNs@@@).

results.title: Metformin Decreases Thyroid Volume and Nodule Size in Subjects with Insulin Resistance: A Preliminary Study
results.text_hl: The mean @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodule@@@ size was also significantly decreased after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy (12.9 +- 7.6 vs. 11.7 +- 7.2 mm, p < 0.0001); 65 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodules@@@ >=5 mm (satisfying one of the inclusion criteria for admission) at the beginning, which decreased to 56 after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy (p = 0.004).

citations.NLM: Anil C, Kut A, Atesagaoglu B, Nar A, Bascil Tutuncu N, Gursoy A. Metformin Decreases Thyroid Volume and Nodule Size in Subjects with Insulin Resistance: A Preliminary Study Med Princ Pract. 2016;25(3):233-6. PMID: 26618447
